content.textMarkupValue:
Monday, April 26, 2021

 

This is a modern looking long-form newsletter template

 

Insert your logo to start making it your own. Keep a white inner color behind your main content with a consistent 40 pixel padding around all images and text to keep this template looking simple and clean on any device.

The feature image and story grab attention and the simple organized blocks keep eyes moving down the page.

 

While we recommend keeping the content of your newsletters short and sweet with redirects to stories on your website or employee intranet, you can put as much or as little of the actual written content in this design as you want.

 

Depending on how employees access your stories, this might be a more effective way for them to digest your content. One example would be enabling a primarily non-desk based workforce to stay in their inbox and not forcing them to open multiple windows on their device.

Add additional stories as separate cards

 

Adding additional stories as separate 'cards' is a great way to separate content from the main body of your newsletter while maintaining a modern look and feel.

 

Simply duplicate or add a new spacer block in between stories to create the card effect.

Get creative with additional cards

 

You can use the card design to separate videos, surveys, quotes, and more to into an easy-to-follow format with a modern aesthetic.

Image galleries that wow

 

Using our three column block layout and setting uniform padding for each image is a quick way to create gorgeous image galleries. We recommend using a small amount of padding, such as 10px seen above, in order to optimize for both desktop and mobile viewing.

 

Explore image editing capabilities and try adding stickers, text, and filters to your images!

Add additional stories as separate cards

 

Adding additional stories as separate 'cards' is a great way to separate content from the main body of your newsletter while maintaining a modern look and feel.

 

Simply duplicate or add a new spacer block in between stories to create the card effect.
This is an internal email and not intended for external distribution. Please do not forward.
